text: Plants have multiple different properties, one of them is the damage Effect.
$(br2)Effects are diverse, doing continuous damage, slowing down Zombies, dealing more damage to specific types, etc.
$(br2)Here's a list of all of the different effects:
$(br)Chill
$(br2)Chill slows down Zombies for a total of 4 seconds, then they are immune to Chill for 4 seconds.
$(br)Damage done by zombies is halved.
$(br)Moves based on animation like Gargantuar's smash are slowed down by half.
$(br2)Machine and Cloth can't be Chilled.
$(br)Deals half the damage against Crystal and Cloth.
$(br2)Frozen
$(br2)Frozen completely stops Zombies in their tracks.
$(br2)Frozen Zombies can't attack.
$(br)Frozen Zombies can't do their abilities.
$(br)Frozen instantly kills zombies that swim and fly, and aren't Gargantuars.
$(br)Deals half the damage against Crystal.
$(br)Machine, Cloth, Stone, and Crystal can't be Frozen.
$(br)Fire
$(br)Sets Zombies on fire, unless they are wet. Wet and Zombies immune to Fire prevent Fire Splash or don't take damage from it, halving direct damage as well.
Zombies on fire take 1 DMG/sec if they are not being attacked.
Zombies get Warm, which prevents Chill from being applied.
Thaws Chilled or Frozen Zombies.
Uncloaks Stealthing Zombies.
$(br)Deals double against Paper, Plant and Cloth, half Rubber and Crystal.
$(br2)Water
$(br2)Wet Zombies, extinguishing and preventing Fire for a short time.
$(br2)Deals 4 DMG/sec to Electronic Zombies.
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Paper and Stone, and half against Plant and Crystal.
$(br2)Wind
$(br2)Knocks back Flying/Hovering Zombies that don't have protection.
$(br2)Instantly kills Small Cloth Zombies.
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Paper and Cloth, and half against Stone and Crystal.
Electricity
$(br2)Chains damage between Zombies, the chain damage is the base damage. Chain's range is by the Electric Radius, that is based on the location of the hit Zombie.
$(br2)Electricity chains by the number of Electric Chains. Metallic, Electronic, and Crystal doesn't count towards the number. Plastic/Plant cost 2 Chains, Rubber zeroes.
$(br2)Electricity chains can hit Stealthing Zombies.
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Wet targets, half against Electronic and Crystal, and 0 against Rubber.
$(br2)Stun
$(br2)Stun completely stops Zombies in their tracks for 0.5 seconds base, unless specified otherwise.
$(br2)Stunned Zombies can't attack.
$(br2)Stunned Zombies can't do their abilities.
$(br2)Covered and Machine Zombies can't be Stunned.
$(br2)Poison
$(br2)Deals continuous direct damage to the Zombie, ignoring armor.
$(br2)Deals 1.5 DMG/0.5sec.
$(br2)Can only be applied to non-covered Flesh or Plant Zombies.
$(br2)Acid
$(br2)Deals continuous damage to Zombie Armor.
$(br2)Deals 8 DMG/0.5sec.
$(br2)Can only be applied to metallic gear.
$(br2)Bounce
$(br2)Knocks Zombies back. Small Zombies instantly die.
$(br2)Hypno
$(br2)Transforms the Zombie into a Hypnotized version of itself.
$(br2)Most of the time they have their abilities, save a few exceptions.
$(br2)Covered Zombies are immune to Hypnosis, Machines themselves can't be hypnotized, but the Zombie controlling them can.
$(br2)Magic
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Crystal and Zombies without headgear and aren't Covered.
$(br2)Hits Stealthing Zombies.
$(br2)Heavy
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Metal, Electronic, Stone, and Crystal.
$(br2)Deals half the damage against Rubber, Paper and Cloth.
$(br2)Sound
$(br2)Has a 25% chance to make the the projectile or other means of attack "critical", which increases the damage by 50%.
$(br2)Hits Stealthing Zombies.
$(br2)Invincibility
$(br2)Can't take damage, but can die to swallowing.
$(br2)Immune to most effects, except Hypnotizing, Bounce, and Doom Rose's Marigold effect.
$(br2)Disabled Machines can't be Invincible.
$(br)Stealth
$(br)Makes the Zombie invulnerable to most projectiles and prevents it from being targeted by most plants.
$(br)They are not immune to splash, explosions, electric chains, melee, etc.
$(br)They can still be targeted by "close-range" Plants, Instant-Use Plants, and Magic or Sound damaging Plants.
$(br)A Zombie is uncloaked if it's on fire, gets 6 blocks near an Illuminating Plant, or starts eating a plant.
